# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/_export_format.py
@source-hash: 448d3ca52ae6e6d0
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:00:45Z

## Export Format Templates

Template definitions for Rich library console output export functionality. Contains HTML and SVG format templates with parameterized styling.

### Constants

**CONSOLE_HTML_FORMAT** (L1-18)
- Complete HTML document template for console output export
- Parameterized with `{stylesheet}`, `{foreground}`, `{background}`, `{code}` placeholders
- Uses monospace font stack (Menlo, DejaVu Sans Mono, Consolas, Courier New)
- Wraps content in `<pre><code>` structure for terminal-like rendering

**CONSOLE_SVG_FORMAT** (L20-73)
- Comprehensive SVG template for scalable console output export
- Uses Fira Code font with CDN fallbacks for consistent typography
- Parameterized with multiple placeholders:
  - Dimensions: `{width}`, `{height}`, `{terminal_width}`, `{terminal_height}`
  - Positioning: `{terminal_x}`, `{terminal_y}`
  - Styling: `{unique_id}`, `{styles}`, `{chrome}`
  - Content: `{lines}`, `{backgrounds}`, `{matrix}`
- Includes font-face definitions for regular (400) and bold (700) Fira Code variants
- Implements clipping path for terminal boundaries
- Structured with background layer, matrix content layer, and chrome elements

**_SVG_FONT_FAMILY** (L75)
- Font family identifier for SVG rendering: "Rich Fira Code"

**_SVG_CLASSES_PREFIX** (L76)
- CSS class prefix for SVG elements: "rich-svg"

### Architecture Notes
- Templates use double-brace escaping (`{{}}`) for literal braces in format strings
- SVG template includes attribution comment for Rich library
- Font loading strategy uses local fonts first, then CDN fallbacks
- Modular design allows for customizable styling through parameter injection
